column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////There you have it. After writing this review
column2: I'm not sure this is a 4 star place even. I guess it is
column3: in a vacuum. When you factor in the price it's a 3 star place. In the end
column4: I guess 3.5 stars? But my review does not scream
column5: "you must go there." So I guess
column6: you don't have to go there.
